extends HashMap

updateProgress

public void updateProgress(String message,
                           int progress)
                    throws MEMEException
Updates the progress monitor being displayed in the client. Sends a ClientProgressEvent across the socket connection to the client.

Parameters:
message - the message to be displayed in the progress monitor
progress - the progress value
Throws:
MEMEException - if failed to update the progress
